title: FireFox 0.9 - One Tree Hill (March/April, 2004)
body: I was just downloading a <a title="real browser" href="http://www.mozilla.org/products/firefox" >real browser</a> to install on my new PC so I <A href="http://www.mozilla.org/projects/firefox/roadmap.html">checked out when the next release of FireFox will be released</A> (haha!).&nbsp; The planned features sound ok, but <A href="http://bugzilla.mozilla.org/buglist.cgi?product=Firefox&amp;target_milestone=Firefox0.9&amp;bug_status=NEW&amp;bug_status=ASSIGNED&amp;bug_status=REOPENED">the list of bugs is tremendous</A>.&nbsp; Many of them sound minor, but there're a few that sound like showstoppers.&nbsp; I haven't found any to submit with this version, just feature requests. I guess I&nbsp;should get crackin'.
bodyArticleHtml:
2004-04-15
